assets.prompt: A warm summer evening at a Christian music camp, with teenagers gathered around playing guitars on a lush green lawn. The scene is illuminated by berry-coloured light, evoking a sense of sunlit worship and acoustic intimacy. The image should be candid and natural, capturing the essence of youth and joy in a landscape of leafy greens and a warm cream sky.

An illustration of a diverse group of teenagers joyfully engaged in music activities at a Christian camp. The scene is dominated by warm cream tones accented with deep raspberry and leafy green, reflecting a youthful, handmade yet polished style. The composition should feel vibrant and inclusive, conveying harmony and growth.
A flat illustration of a microphone with sound waves in deep raspberry on a white background. The design should be simple yet bold, with consistent stroke weight to match other icons.
A flat illustration of an acoustic guitar in leafy green on a white background. The style should be clean and minimalistic, ensuring visual coherence with other icons.
A flat illustration of a conductor's baton with musical notes in a deep raspberry on a white background. The image should be simple, with clean lines to maintain consistency with other icons.
A flat illustration of a music note in harmony with another note, in leafy green on a white background. Designed to complement the visual style of other icons with a focus on unity and balance.
A flat illustration of a cross intertwined with a guitar, in deep raspberry on a white background. The design must be sleek and understated, maintaining coherence with the rest of the icon set.
A flat illustration of three overlapping circles, symbolizing community, in leafy green on a white background. Simple strokes and shapes should echo the unified visual language of the other icons.

An illustration capturing the spirit of giving, with hands extended holding a heart symbol in deep raspberry. The background should be warm cream, creating an inviting and uplifting atmosphere. The style should be whimsical yet sincere, evoking a sense of community and support.

A vibrant and engaging image promoting MusicJam with the words 'MusicJam' and 'Play. Worship. Grow.' prominently displayed. The composition should include elements of guitars, music notes, and a sunlit outdoor scene. Colors should incorporate deep raspberry and leafy green, ensuring the image is impactful and aligns with the camp's warm and youthful branding.
